function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Environmental change, insecticide resistance, and population growth","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate vector control measures leading to the maintenance of robust disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historic examples of ’military-like’ vector control lacking community engagement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Call for strengthening vector control following the zika epidemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of collaboration with non-health sectors in vector control","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate development and testing of novel vector control tools","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence of insecticide resistance in anopheles and aedes vectors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in the number of entomologists working at who’s headquarters in geneva","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shift in vector control approaches to uniform insecticide-based commodities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underfunding of vector control r&d and programmes","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate funding for ntds","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global financing shortfalls for malaria control and elimination","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective vaccines for vector-borne diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complacency and lack of investment in vector control","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of political will and central coordination","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate housing and lack of basic services, including water and waste management, create ideal habitats for expanding ae. aegypti populations","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Geographic expansion of vectors and viruses through globalization and urbanization","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of investment in aedes vector control leading to ineffective prevention of aedes-borne epidemics","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective control methods for tsetse flies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relaxation of disease control programs in non-endemic regions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Neglect of surveillance activities leading to increase in hat cases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Scaling down of tsetse control campaigns leading to increase in hat cases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delay in eliminating transmission of hat by 2030","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Chagas disease and leishmaniasis transmission","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective vector control methods","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of vector behavior on disease control","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in prevalence of human microfilariae infections from 70% to negligible levels is reported.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Onchocerciasis elimination program of the americas oepa launched in 1991, and the african programme for onchocerciasis control apoc established in 19 african countries.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Success of vector control against chagas disease in the southern cone initiative sci and similar initiatives in central america and andean pact countries.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Combining drugs with vector control may be more effective than either approach alone.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vector control playing a minor role to mass drug administration mda as a supplementary intervention.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Success of vector control in onchocerciasis control programme ocp in africa.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate coverage of itns","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High rainfall in some parts of ssa","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on insecticide-based malaria vector control leading to insecticide resistance","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Selective approach to vector control","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasis on research over implementation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Community-level effect of itns","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sociopolitical instability and limited socioeconomic development in malaria-endemic areas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insecticide and drug resistance","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rebound of malaria transmission after intervention cessation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of ddt in vector control","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Abandonment of global malaria eradication programs","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Aerial spraying resulting in concerns about the environmental impact of ddt and dieldrin","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced infrastructures for spraying","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ddt and dieldrin in control programs","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weak vector control and surveillance","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate political support for eradication campaigns","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cross-border invasion of ae. aegypti","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Abandonment of environmental management practices like drainage of marshes and housing improvements","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
